flc.lambdactor.core

Interface IGreenThr

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Executor
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IActorRef<A>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActorRef, GreenThr_single, GreenThr_zero
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    public interface IGreenThr
extends java.util.concurrent.Executor
    Green Thread.

    Schedule Runnable messages. Also used to initiate actor references (ActorBase.initThread(IGreenThr)).

    Date: 18.07.13

    • Method Summary

      void execute(java.lang.Runnable msg)
      Schedule a runnable message.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        void execute(java.lang.Runnable msg)
        Schedule a runnable message. All messages are executed sequentially; at most one Runnable are processed at any time.

        (Implementations should call ThreadContext.get().beforeRun() before running.)

        Specified by:
        execute in interface java.util.concurrent.Executor
        Parameters:
        msg - Runnable message
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if command is null
